mapper.insert: insert into qingjia(student, teacher, start_time, end_time, cause, name, clazz, comy, phone) values (#{qingjia.student}, #{qingjia.teacher}, #{qingjia.start_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qingjia.end_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qingjia.cause}, #{qingjia.name}, #{qingjia.clazz}, #{qingjia.comy}, #{qingjia.phone})
mapper.select:
select *,(select count(*) from qingjia qingjia2 where qingjia2.student = qingjia1.student ) as num from qingjia qingjia1 where qingjia1.student = #{student}
and find_in_set(qingjia1.comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia
where find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where student = #{student}
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where (date_format(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d') or date_format(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where (date_format(start_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m') or date_format(end_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m'))
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where (date_format(start_time, '%Y') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y') or date_format(end_time, '%Y') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y'))
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where name like "%" #{name} "%"
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select * from qingjia where clazz like "%" #{clazz} "%"
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})
mapper.update: update qingjia set student = #{student}, start_time = #{start_time}, teacher = #{teacher}, cause = #{cause}, end_time = #{end_time}, `name` = #{name}, clazz = #{clazz}, comy = #{comy}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id};
mapper.select:
select count(*) from qingjia where (start_time like "%" #{date} "%" or end_time like "%" #{date} "%")
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select DISTINCT COUNT(*) from qingjia where TO_DAYS(end_time)=TO_DAYS(NOW())
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where TO_DAYS(start_time)=TO_DAYS(#{time})
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select count(*) from qingjia where TO_DAYS(end_time)=TO_DAYS(#{time})
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})

select * from qingjia where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW())
and find_in_set(comy,#{comy})
